content.query:
if object_id('DeltaDropTarget') is not null drop proc DeltaDropTarget
go 

create proc DeltaDropTarget
as 

    if object_id('target') is not null
    begin
        drop table target
    end 
go

--reset table
select * from target
delete from [target]
insert target values('a','0')
insert target values('b','1')
insert target values('c','2')
insert target values('d','3')
select * from target

delete from [target]
insert target values('d','3')
insert target values('c','200')
